Data Flow Analysis:

Data Flow Task found in package.

Components:
  -  (Unknown)

  - Flat File Destination (Destination)
    Description: Flat File Destination

  - Lookup (Unknown)
    Description: Joins additional columns to the data flow by looking up values in a table. For example, join to the 'employee id' column the employees table to get 'hire date' and 'employee name'. We recommend this transformation when the lookup table can fit into memory.
    SqlCommand: select * from [Production].[Product]

  - OLE DB Source (Source)
    Description: OLE DB Source

  -  (Unknown)

  - Audit (Unknown)
    Description: Includes data about the environment in which the package runs. Map system variables to new output columns. For example, add the name of the computer and operator to the data flow.

  - GetAllEnvVar (Unknown)
    Description: Includes and runs custom script code. For example, apply a business rule that limits the range of valid values in an "income" column or add values in two columns and calculate the average of the sum.

  - OLE DB Destination (Destination)
    Description: OLE DB Destination

  -  (Unknown)

  - Cache Transform (Unknown)
    Description: Writes data to a cache (a .caw file) with the Cache Connection Manager. Reuse the cache between multiple Lookup transforms to reduce database load. Share the cache to reduce memory usage. Note: cache data is stored in clear text and not recommended for sensitive data.

  - OLE DB Source (Source)
    Description: OLE DB Source

Data Paths:
  - :  → 
  - Lookup Match Output: Lookup.Outputs[Lookup Match Output] → Flat File Destination.Inputs[Flat File Destination Input]
  - OLE DB Source Output: OLE DB Source.Outputs[OLE DB Source Output] → Lookup.Inputs[Lookup Input]
  - :  → 
  - Audit Output 1: Audit.Outputs[Audit Output 1] → OLE DB Destination.Inputs[OLE DB Destination Input]
  - Output: GetAllEnvVar.Outputs[Output] → Audit.Inputs[Audit Input 1]
  - :  → 
  - OLE DB Source Output: OLE DB Source.Outputs[OLE DB Source Output] → Cache Transform.Inputs[Cache Input]
